==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}
{{zh-wp|zh|yue}}

===Etymology===
Attestable since at least the Eastern Han dynasty. The sense of “doctor” is {{wasei kango|博%士|はく%し|nocap=1}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=bóshì,tl=y
|c=bok3 si6
|h=pfs=pok-sṳ
|md=báuk-sê̤ṳ
|mn=xm,zz,tw:phok-sū/qz:phok-sǐr
|w=4poq zr
|ma=y
|mc=y
|oc=y
|cat=n
}}

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# [[doctorate]]; [[Ph.D.]]
#: {{zh-x|博士生|'''doctorate''' candidate}}
#: {{zh-x|哲學.博士|'''Doctor''' of Philosophy}}
#: {{zh-x|他 剛 從 ^北京 大學 取得 博士 學位。|He recently obtained his '''doctorate''' degree from Peking University.}}
# [[doctor]] {{gloss|someone with a [[Ph.D.]]}}
#: {{zh-x|^吳 博士|'''Dr.''' Wu}}
#: {{zh-x|張 博士 是 這 場 講座 的 主講人。|'''Dr.''' Zhang is the presenter of this seminar.}}
# {{lb|zh|history}} [[court]] [[academician]] (in feudal China)
# {{lb|zh|history}} [[master]]; [[person]] with a [[particular]] [[skill]]
#: {{zh-x|茶 博士|a tea '''master'''}}
# {{lb|zh|history}} [[learned]] [[scholar]]; [[polymath]]

* → Manchu: {{l|mnc|ᠪᠠᡴᠰᡳ||tr=baksi}}, {{l|mnc|ᠪᠠᡴᡧᡳ|tr=bakši||scholar; Confucian scholar}}
